resources.string: Do you have any questions about this app? Read our detailed explanations here.
Are your friends on Faceless yet?
On Faceless, your friends will never see your name. This makes conversations honest and entertaining.
How do you like this app? We would be very happy if you could rate our application on Google Play. Thanks for your support!
You will no longer receive messages from this user
What topic do you want to write something about? Your choice helps others to see only the content they\'re interested in.
Do you want to publish this comment for all users?\n\nIf you want to reply to somebody privately instead, please tap on the respective comment.
Your request could not be handled by the server
Faceless is out of service for a short time
Please update Faceless to the latest version via Google Play
You have been temporarily banned due to reports by other persons
This is an example: Just start by writing your own message

string-array.name: example_messages
string-array.item: Have been drawing for years, but never shown to anyone.
For the last three weeks, I\'ve slept in my car.
Nobody at work knows that I\'ve been in jail.
I always eat the food I\'m buying when I\'m still in the supermarket.
I\'m in love with my best friend.
My hair looks better when not washed for some days.
Just been on vacation with my wife for the first time.
My boyfriend still hasn\'t met my parents.
Every day, I consider quitting my job and moving to another city.
Is anybody out there truthfully happy?
Whenever I read wedding announcements in the paper, I become jealous.

string-array.name: introduction_steps
string-array.item: Faceless is where you can talk freely.\n\nShare messages with your friends and the whole world.
You can be open, no matter what you talk about.\n\nNobody will see who you are — it\'s only about your words.
You won\'t have to manage a friends list on Faceless.\n\nYou will be connected to your contacts automatically.
Remember, everything is shared anonymously.\n\nPeople will see your messages, but they won\'t know who you are.
This app is no place for bullying, harassment or negativity.\n\nGet started by writing your first message on the next screen.

resources.string:
Talking freely is even more fun with your friends.

On Faceless, they will never see your name. They will just see that you're a "Friend".

This makes conversations as truthful as they can possibly get.

Continue to invite friends via email or any other app available on your phone.

There have been too many failed login attempts for your account.

This may also have been caused by another person who tried to get access to your account.

Thus we are now protecting your account and have temporarily locked it.

Please try again later!

string-array.name: meta_about
string-array.item: Faceless is where you can talk freely, to your friends and the whole world.
You can be open, no matter what you talk about. Nobody will see who you are — it\'s only about your message.
Enjoy openness and kindness. Get truthful responses and honest opinions. Let your ideas spread around the world.
You don\'t have a profile to worry about. There\'s no need to brag. It\'s just your words that count.
Talk about things that might be embarrassing, and don\'t be afraid to ask a question. Share things without any downsides!
You will be connected to your friends automatically. Read their messages and write comments — you will never know exactly who they are.
Share stories, ask questions, discuss life or confess things. Just be yourself.
Be honest and genuine. Be smart and positive.

string.name: meta_open_source_title
string.b: This app uses the following third-party components which are available under the terms of open-source licenses:

string-array.name: meta_permissions_body
string-array.item: + \"Read phone status and identity\": Get your phone number, securely encrypt it, and use the encrypted number to anonymously connect you with your friends.
+ \"Read your contacts\": Get your contacts\' phone numbers, securely encrypt them, and use the encrypted numbers to anonymously connect you with your friends.
+ \"Full network access\": Send/receive messages, comments and favorites.
+ \"Run at startup\": Setting up notifications and synchronization again when you had switched off your device.

string-array.name: meta_privacy_body
string-array.item: + We only access your phone number and your contacts\' phone numbers. We don\'t access any names, email addresses or other contact details.
+ Phone numbers are encrypted with an irreversible one-way encryption (hash function) on your device and only afterwards send to our servers. Real phone numbers never leave your device.
+ As you can see, we require only those app permissions that are really necessary. No heavy list of extended permissions as with other apps.

string-array.name: meta_questions_answers

item.b: Do I have to sign up for Faceless?

string-array.item: No. You don\'t need an account, neither an email address nor a password. No Facebook, no Google, no Twitter.

item.b: Who can see that I am the author of a message?

string-array.item: Nobody. People will only see that you are a \"Friend\" or a \"Friend of a friend\". Otherwise, we may show them your country, but never something specific.
Yes. The only thing that will be shown is whether a comment has been written by the same person who also wrote the original message.

item.b: Can I see which of my friends are on Faceless already?

string-array.item: No. This is to protect their privacy. From time to time, we may show you the number of friends, without any names, of course.

item.b: Can I ignore or block a particular person?

string-array.item: Yes. If you don\'t like what a person posts, you can add them to your block list. This cannot be undone later, however!

item.b: Can I help translate the app?

string-array.item: Yes, that would be great! Please find your language on: https://www.localize.im/v/36

string-array.name: meta_security_body
string-array.item: + All communication between the app and our servers is encrypted with SSL/TLS. Before your messages and comments are saved on our servers, they are encrypted again.
+ No personal information is ever send to any device. Your friends and other users have no way to find out who you are, unless you reveal your identity yourself.
+ Messages and comments don\'t stay online forever. They will be destroyed after some time automatically.
+ Even if your friends correctly guessed a message that you wrote, they would still not know about any other message of yours.
+ Faceless is independent. There is no big company behind and we don\'t try to maximize profits.

resources.string: Your report has been successfully sent

Are you sure you want to block the author of this entry?

You will no longer receive any messages from that person in the future.

This action cannot be undone later.

Are you sure you want to report this entry as inappropriate?

A report may cause the entry to be deleted and the author to be temporarily banned from Faceless.

If you are reporting a message, it will be removed from your personal feed immediately.

Please enter your phone number below to finish setup.

Start with a "+" followed by your country code (e.g. +41).

After that, just enter your local phone number.

Please double-check that the number is correct!

If you don't enter your correct number, we won't be able to connect you to your friends.

Of course, your phone number is secure with us. We respect your privacy!
Could not save and share the message

www.localize.im/v/36

Thank you so much for your support!
Condividi un pensiero …\n\nSii gentile e positivo.

In the next step, you'll be asked to start your usual app for text messages.

Please don't use WhatsApp or similar apps here, this won't work.

We'll have filled in the recipient and the content for your text message already.

Please don't change the text and just press "Send" to complete the verification.

A few minutes later, you should be able to open Faceless and use all features as expected.

Note: The normal fees by your carrier for international text messages apply.

In order to protect you and your friends from fraud, we must verify your phone number.

This helps us offer a secure and enjoyable service for all users.

Do you want to verify your number now?

Note: You can only use this app on a single device.

Need help? Get in touch with us at %s
